Title: Boys in the Yard
Writer: Timothy Hobart, Reg Watson (creator), Darren Chau (inspired by an idea from)
Actors: Danielle Cormack, Nicole da Silva, Kate Atkinson, Celia Ireland
Plot: Simmo returns to prison and starts selling drugs for Brayden. Bea befriends her in order to lure Brayden into a trap. Franky takes issue with Simmo selling drugs and gets Boomer to attack ...
